sentences.en: Although exceptions could be made, the rule still stands.
sentences.cn: 虽然可能有例外，但该规定仍然有效。

sentences.en: Although geographically linked, the two provinces have long fought for political ascendancy.
sentences.cn: 尽管在地理上彼此依存，两省却长期为获取政治支配权你争我夺。

sentences.en: Although he was only grumbling, his choice of words made Rodney angry.
sentences.cn: 尽管他只是在咕哝，可是他的措词却让罗德妮恼火。

sentences.en: Although her illness is serious, her condition is beginning to stabilize.
sentences.cn: 虽然她病得很重，但病情正开始趋于稳定。

sentences.en: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.cn: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

sentences.en: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.cn: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.en: Although it's not strenuous exercise, you feel toned-up, supple and relaxed.
sentences.cn: 虽然这不是剧烈运动，但会让人感到强健、柔韧与放松。

sentences.en: Although most condoms contain spermicide, there are some manufactured without.
sentences.cn: 虽然多数避孕套含有杀精剂，但也有一些是不含的。

sentences.en: Although not ideal, this attitude is not entirely destructive.
sentences.cn: 这种态度虽然不够理想，但还不至于消极透顶。

sentences.en: Although she had various boyfriends, Madeleine was, and remains, fiercely self-sufficient.
sentences.cn: 尽管有过各种各样的男朋友，马德琳过去和现在一直都非常自立。

sentences.en: Although sometimes I feel like bothering, as often as not I don't.
sentences.cn: 虽然我有时会觉得这是在找麻烦，但是通常并不会这样。

sentences.en: Although the car is basically sound, I was worried about certain areas.
sentences.cn: 尽管这辆汽车基本状况良好，我还是担心一些地方不够安全。

sentences.en: Although the coral looks hard, it is very delicate.
sentences.cn: 珊瑚虽然看上去坚固，实际上非常易碎。

sentences.en: Although the journey was a long and lonely one, Tumalo pushed on.
sentences.cn: 虽然旅途漫长孤独，图马罗还是继续前行。

sentences.en: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style.
sentences.cn: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。

sentences.en: Although things are changing the medical establishment is still overwhelmingly male.
sentences.cn: 虽然世易时移，但医学界依然是男性的天下。

sentences.en: Although this recipe looks long, it is actually very quick to prepare.
sentences.cn: 尽管这个菜谱看上去很长，其实做起来很快。

sentences.en: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.en: You can copy down my answers, although I’m not sure they’re right.
sentences.cn: 你可以抄我的答案，但是我不敢肯定我答得是否正确。

trans.tran_en: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely
